Title: Rothenberger claw hammer with fibreglass handle 20oz
Description: With its curved design and tough drop-forged, heat-treated steel construction, this Rothenberger 20oz claw hammer is capable of tackling the toughest driving and prying jobs. Made in two pieces, the hammer features a comfortable ergonomic soft-grip handle and a fibreglass neck that resists breakage and reduces vibration.
